title: Rani Haaram: Diamond Delight with Ruby Accents and Pearl Drops
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features a unique Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Elaborate floral and paisley motifs intricately set with sparkling diamonds. The necklace showcases two central pendants, each adorned with a square cut ruby. Delicate pearl drops enhance the overall elegance. The piece boasts a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian nakshi work, blended seamlessly with contemporary design.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with vibrant red rubies and creamy white pearls.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for Seemantham (శ్రీమంతం)
description: A breathtaking statement piece combining the best of traditional craftsmanship with modern aesthetics. The high-quality diamonds and genuine rubies ensure enduring beauty and value. The Hyderabadi Polish guarantees a lasting luster. This Haaram embodies prosperity and good fortune, making it an ideal heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. A true investment in timeless elegance.
